item.title: 1036 C
item.description: score:1036 Chances: Citigroup’s Asia family office business expects a 25% increase in clients this year, indicating growth opportunities in the wealth management sector in Asia. The bank’s family office business experienced a strong 50% year-on-year client increase in Asia in the past year, showing positive momentum in the region’s demand for private investment vehicles and business succession planning.
